latest update

2012-01-03 21:29:59 +1100
I'll be updating my old posts once I get the urge. In the meantime, I'm making random notes on Windows 8 here.

about

By day, I'm a Senior Developer with Readify in Sydney, Australia. I work with clients using technologies including ASP.NET, WPF, Silverlight and WP7 - and help development teams to make the most of these technologies.
Outside of work, you'll likely find me hanging out in the community - sometimes up the front presenting, sometimes up the back heckling, and sometimes holding down the bar at the after party.
Currently trying to find time to invest in some open source projects again, like MahTweets and Hanoi. And some other things which I'm keeping to myself for the moment...
